data.text: Zɔi é zeini, nii é Anii-Pɛ-Unda, naa ná-dooɠo bosuʋɛ,
Gè ɠɛ ma: «Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ɠa è ga dɔ̀ɔɠuzuʋɛ, ta nà-siɠigi,
Ungo, tɔ ɠa é è unmɔɔsu, é è ɠula balii ɠa tɛai è luɠɔ,
Toɠa è maalɔɔɠu koʋegiti bu, ɗa lɔɔɠu kpeɠabuʋɛ,
È la lua ani nɔpɛ ba, anɛɛ kpidii zu maalua vai,
anɛɛ ɗɔfɔ zeeɓɛi, nii é ziɛzu kpidii zu,
Ungo, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa ga dɔ̀ɔɠuzuʋɛ!
Faa ɲɔu nɔpɛ ge la zeelia è ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa devei ve ná-geezuɠeelaiti zea ɗa-vaa zu,
Ɗa ziɛ zalai ta pɛɛɠaalii ma, faa nɔpɛ ge la ɠɛa ga ɗe,
Maliɠii ɠɛ ma: «Tɔɔzei giliʋɛ nɔ̀un ba,
